name: Don't Say Gay: Choose Your Own Misadventure
name_original: Don't Say Gay: Choose Your Own Misadventure
description: You are a queer educator in Florida on the day the Don't Say Gay bill was signed into law. You have no idea how you will face your students today. Will you address the news to your class? Will that get you in trouble? How seriously will these new regulations be enforced? As a queer educator, is your job on the line if you speak about your identity? Your head spinning with questions. Could there be ways to affirm your students despite this draconian legislation? Play to find out.
